institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) operating rules/Article 11 (Corporation's role and business performance support)
contents: Article 11 (Roles of the Corporation and support for business performance) ① The department in charge of the Corporation holds new ISC recruitment notices and business briefing sessions, operates a review and deliberation committee, concludes agreements between the Corporation and ISC, provides and settles operating expenses support funds including performance operating expenses, and provides unique services. It performs function-oriented ISC operation and project execution support, monitoring and consulting, support for enhancing the capabilities of secretariat staff, performance evaluation, selection and management of support centers, and support for the ISC council. ② The business management department of the Corporation makes individual business agreements with the ISC ( (Contract) conclusion, project cost payment, project execution support, settlement, monitoring, performance evaluation, etc.
